import { Component, Input } from "@angular/core"; import Quest from "src/common/interfaces/quest.interface"; @Component({ selector: "app-quest", templateUrl: "./quest.component.html", styleUrls: ["./quest.component.scss"], }) export class QuestComponent { // @Input() quest!: Quest; quest: Quest = { title: "Rescue the Princess", description: "The Princess has been kidnapped by the evil dragon, go rescue her!", goal: "Defeat the dragon and rescue the Princess", steps: [ "Travel to the dragon's lair", "Defeat the dragon in battle", "Rescue the Princess from the dragon's clutches", "Return the Princess safely to her castle", ], rewards: ["The gratitude of the Princess", "A bag of gold"], isCompleted: false, }; }
